title: Borussia Dortmund keen to keep Emre Can beyond 2026
snippet: Out of contract in the summer of 2026, Borussia Dortmund captain Emre Can looks set to be offered a new contract by the club. According to Sport Bild, Can’s current deal includes a clause that could automatically extend his contract by a further ...

title: Emre Can postpones Dortmund future talks
snippet: Emre Can has just one year left on his contract with Borussia Dortmund, but he's not focusing on his future at the moment.

title: Borussia Dortmund Set to Retain Emre Can for 2026/27 Season Despite Extension Clause Uncertainty - Sportingpedia - Latest Sports News From All Over the World
snippet: Key Takeaways: Borussia Dortmund have formed plans to keep Emre Can for next season, as indicated by recent reports Can’s contract extension until 2027 hinges on appearance-related criteria, which he may not meet due to an early injury this ...

title: Besiktas, Fenerbahce, Galatasaray to race for Dortmund's Emre Can: Report - Türkiye Today
snippet: Dortmund reportedly plans to keep German international beyond 2026, citing his leadership role and squad stability ahead of a cautious summer reshuffle

title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: On 31 January 2020, Borussia Dortmund announced Can's signing on loan until the end of the 2019–20 season, with an obligation to buy. On 8 February, Can made his debut for Dortmund, also scoring a goal in a 4–3 away loss to Bayer Leverkusen.
